db:abstract.db:para: A web browser implemented using the WebEngineView QML type.

db:article.db:programlisting:
requires(contains(QT_CONFIG, accessibility))
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = quicknanobrowser
HEADERS = utils.h SOURCES = main.cpp
OTHER_FILES += ApplicationRoot.qml \ BrowserDialog.qml \ BrowserWindow.qml \ DownloadView.qml \ FullScreenNotification.qml
RESOURCES += resources.qrc
QT += qml quick webengine
qtHaveModule(widgets) { QT += widgets # QApplication is required to get native styling with QtQuickControls }
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/webengine/quicknanobrowser INSTALLS += target
